name: tidepool rectangle tee
notes:
this listing is for the tidepool rectangle tee crochet pattern pdf digital download only. this is not a finished product.

this pdf tidepool rectangle tee crochet pattern is written in english using standard american terms. it has been professionally tech-edited and is written in technical writing.

 if you can crochet a rectangle, you can make this breezy summer tee. worked in two main pieces, you’ll find this a meditative and satisfying project to make by the pool or campfire. 
follow the pattern as written or lean on the detailed instructions for customizing the length and fit to suit your style.

this shirt pattern is perfect for less experienced crocheters looking to make a stylish first garment or more advanced crocheters who want an easy, satisfying project. full step-by-step video tutorial included!

advanced beginner skills you’ll practice include double crochet, meeting the pattern gauge, and basic seaming.

this ad-free, printable pdf includes a written pattern, tutorial diagrams, stitch chart and link to the detailed video tutorial.

yarn needed - category 3/dk weight such as lion brand 27/7 cotton dk or similar

sizing/measurements - the flexible nature of this tee  will accommodate many body types. 

size // fits bust:
xs....30”
s.....34”
m.....38"
l.....42”
1x.....46”
2x.....50”
3x.....54"
4x......58"
5x.....62"

* see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing.

yarn amount
between 876-1,752 yards of a category 3 yarn, depending on the size you make. we recommend lion brand 24/7 cotton dk.

hook size
size e (3.5 mm) crochet hook

‍downloading - this listing is for the tidepool rectangle tee crochet pattern pdf digital download only. pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment.
